attributes.action: Stop minimum price of alcohol in Scotland
attributes.background: Enough said in the title, all this is, is a way for the Scottish government to further line the pockets for them self and for the SNP to use that money to transport them self around with our money in fancy cars And make up some stupid rule out of line with the rest of the UK to fund her damaging way

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
